mapper.insert: insert into registlevel (id, RegistCode, RegistName, IsDefault, Sequence, RegistFee, RegistQuota, DelMark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdefault,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{registquota,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delmark,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update registlevel set RegistCode = #{registcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RegistName = #{registname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsDefault = #{isdefault,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RegistFee = #{registfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RegistQuota = #{registquota,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DelMark = #{delmark,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, RegistCode, RegistName, IsDefault, Sequence, RegistFee, RegistQuota, DelMark from registlevel
